resources.string: Which of the following are the primary goals of network security? (Choose 3 best answers)
Which of the following statements best describes confidentiality of information?
Refers to keeping the data private and preventing unauthorized access
Refers to making the data available any time that a client wants to access
Refers to keeping the data secure from being modified in storage or transmit
Refers to making the data private, secure and available
According to Cisco, organizational data is classified into four categories. Which of the following is NOT classification category?
